section.title: Getting the source code
section.para: The source code of each maven artifact is available in the JBoss maven repository as a source jar. The same source jars are also included in the download zips. However, if you want to build from source, it's highly recommended to get our sources from our source control.
Drools and jBPM use Git for source control. The blessed git repositories are hosted on Github:

Git allows you to fork our code, independtly make personal changes on it, yet still merge in our latest changes regularly and optionally share your changes with us. To learn more about git, read the free book Git Pro.

para.emphasis: To build our code from source, follow the instructions in the README file in droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap.
